item.description:
Register at https://www4.gotomeeting.com/register/590316439

Come learn the step-by-step, nuts and bolts Money Making Secrets of Finding, Buying, Structuring, Holding, Managing, Financing and Selling Real Estate revealed by a Full Time Professional who has been buying and selling houses since he was a teenager!

Ask Lou the Real Estate Question you need answers to... and get prepared for Saturday.

Lou has been investing in real estate since he was a teenager.... and he is still actively buying, holding, and selling real estate.

group.name: CT REIA - The Connecticut Real Estate Investors Assn. Meetup

item.name: Free Webinar: Real Estate Money Making Secrets with Lou Brown
